description: Actual dates of action associated with the P-Card payments, including deadline for Works editing; when the P-Card download to PeopleSoft will occur each month; the date agencies can begin preparing their P-Card vouchers, and the submission deadline for the vouchers received at OMES each month.

name: P-Card Scheduled Pay Cycle
